instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.ISL6259: What is ISL6259? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2010 through 2015.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B Power up and down loop
threads.message:
Hi everybody ;

No corrosion and not dropped machine;

When Push power button fan spins but no sound,no screen,not light on status led and power off and start it self again, if i remove memory,machine beeps and not turn off.
Removed every cable,connectors and pull out board nothing changed.
I'm using 5A / 30V adjustable dc power supply and working with magsafe cables on boards when repairing boards. Its very helpful for describing problem. This machine starting with 0,8A and going 1,25A ( its normally of post process) PSU cuts power Constant Current LED and start boot process again.

Note: Removed LCD backlight fuse,replaced BIOS,

Sorry for bad english...

Thanks

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B Power up and down loop
threads.message: Voltage on F7040 is stable??, Should be about 12.6V... Check sense resistors from <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP>...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B Power up and down loop
threads.message: Yes 12.6v is stable , also removed fuse and injected 12.6 v  directly nothing change
